title: Wading through some Bible Contradictions Pt.1
description:
I was recently asked to respond to these supposed Bible Contradictions. I only got through 4 of the total 15 I wanted to respond to. I will get to the others in more videos. Here is the link to the list I am responding to: https://www.atheists.org/activism/resources/biblical-contradictions/

I hope this may be helpful to someone. I tried to avoid apologizing for these passages or explaining them away. I felt that the article which listed these contradictions was rather disingenuous. If one feels that I improperly addressed these passages, then I would be happy to try to adjust my understanding if reason warrants that.  

*THE THUMBNAIL IMAGE OF THIS VIDEO BELONGS TO THE AMERICAN ATHEISTS ASSOCIATION. IN NO WAY AM I TRYING TO MISREPRESENT THEM WITH THE USE OF THIS IMAGE. 

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
